title: In your own words, state what 'self' is for Ryle the philosophers. After doing so, explain how your concept of 'self is compatible with how they conceived of the 'self. Ryle? - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn't a self-concept to be found here. It seems useless and, at times, problematic. Why bother with such things? Why not live in the light of truth instead of mediating life through the filter of a self-concept?
